item.title: Information about Becoming an Intro Lab TA
item.description: If you want to be notified when Spring 2023 applications will open, submit a notice of interest here! We’ll be in touch when hiring opens in mid-January 2023. Why would you want to be a lab TA? It’s rewarding to help people! Yaaay! It’s fun to help people with COS! Yaaay! You get lots and lots and lots of debugging experience! You get paid! You really get to know the 126 & 226 & 217 material!
